jasmine.regression.LinearRegression.evaluate

LinearRegression.evaluate(X, y, metrics_fn=<function r2_score>)[source]

Evaluate the model using specified metrics.

Parameters:

  • X (jnp.ndarray) – Input features

  • y (jnp.ndarray) – Target values

  • metrics (callable) – Metric function to evaluate the model

Returns:

Computed metric value

Return type:

float
